mapper.select: select * from wtm_member_score s WHERE s.memberId=#{memberId};
mapper.sql: flowType.typeName typeName,flowType.typeDesc typeDesc,flow.flowScore flowCount,flow.createTime flowTime,flow.isFinished isFinished,flow.typeId typeId
mapper.select:
select
from wtm_member_score score LEFT JOIN wtm_member_score_flow flow ON score.id=flow.memberScoreId LEFT JOIN wtm_member_score_flow_type flowType ON flowType.id = flow.typeId WHERE flow.typeId IN (1,2) AND score.memberId=#{memberId} order by flow.createTime Desc

update wtm_member_score score
when score.memberId=#{i} then score.memberScore + (select CASE m.totalScore is NULL WHEN TRUE THEN 0 ELSE m.totalScore END AS totalScore from ( select SUM(f.flowScore) totalScore from wtm_member_score s LEFT JOIN wtm_member_score_flow f ON f.memberScoreId=s.id WHERE s.memberId=#{i} AND f.createTime < unix_timestamp(now()) AND f.createTime > #{time} AND f.typeId=7 AND f.flowScore < 0) m )
select s.avaliableScore,l.nickname from wtm_member_score s LEFT JOIN wtm_third_login l ON s.memberId=l.memberId WHERE s.memberId=#{memberId} AND l.sourceType=1;
